titles.title: A resolution recognizing the importance of National Neighbor Day, National Good Neighbor Day, and National Neighborhood Day.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/18/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Calls upon the people of the United States and interested groups and organizations to celebrate the goals of National Neighbor Day, National Good Neighbor Day, and National Neighborhood Day in 2008.
